overview:
NeighborhoodTrainer.com is a website to help match NYC personal trainers, pilates instructors, yoga instructors, nutritionists, and health coaches with people in New York City looking for their services based on their specific needs and goals.

NeighborhoodTrainers covers all five boroughs of Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Staten Island, and the Bronx.

All NYC fitness professionals are invited to register, simply go to theregistration page and fill in the information requested. Their is NO TECHNICAL SETUP necessary on your end at all. The initial registration takes less than five minutes. Once you register, you can login to enter your certification information, select the neighborhood zip codes that you service and then click on the boxes outlining your services, experience, and rate information. You also have options to add some of your own background information, upload your photo, company logo, a sample video, pdf flyer, and link your personal website, as well as Facebook and Twitter. Youâ€™ll be online in just a few minutes.

It is free for someone to search for a trainer. Itâ€™s simple, if you are looking for a fitness trainer or instructor, simply enter your NYC zip code in the box above. Your search results will list all of the registered personal trainers and fitness instructors that service your area. You can click on their business profile to learn more about their skills and experience. If you like what you see, then you can send them an email directly from their profile page. If you have special criteria you need to address, you can also perform an advanced search.
